entries.title: Add support for requests hash EVM data
entries.author: fracek
entries.summary: The `requests_hash` field (EIP-7685) is present on Ethereum Sepolia streams.

entries.title: PGLite and pg packages are now a peer dependency
entries.author: fracek
entries.summary: We changed the `@apibara/plugin-drizzle` package to lazily load the Node Postgres and PGLite packages.
